short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple app that displays the daily five islamic prayer times for a selected your city and country.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your Salaat with ease!

Features:

- Auto-Location Detection: Automatically finds your location for accurate prayer times.
- Location-Based Prayer Times: Get precise prayer schedules for your specific area.
- Selectable Prayer Calculation Methods: Choose the method that aligns with your beliefs.

Your Privacy Matters: We value your privacy. Our extension does not store your location or device information, and our source code is openly available for your review.

Support Our Development: Consider donating to help us continue improving this tool for you.

We Value Your Feedback: Please leave us a review and share any suggestions. Your input is crucial to our continuous improvement!

Donate Now: Your support fuels our development efforts! (Donation is in-app)
